channel.title: Out-of-Band on Bloodstiller: Ethical Hacking & Active Directory Security Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Out-of-Band on Bloodstiller: Ethical Hacking & Active Directory Security Blog

item.title: SQLi Vulnerabilities: Lab 14: Blind SQL injection with out-of-band data exfiltration
item.description:
Lab 14: Blind SQL injection with out-of-band data exfiltration:

+Note+:

  • This lab requires burp collaborator to complete which is only available with burpsuite professional, you can easily sign up for a burpsuite professional trial but for some reason they do not accept gmail accounts so use something else.
  • This also just sometimes doesn’t work so you need to retry the same payload.

This lab contains a blind SQL injection vulnerability. The application uses a tracking cookie for analytics, and performs a SQL query containing the value of the submitted cookie.

item.title: SQLi Vulnerabilities: Lab 13: Blind SQL injection with out-of-band interaction

Lab 13: Blind SQL injection with out-of-band interaction:

This lab contains a blind SQL injection vulnerability. The application uses a tracking cookie for analytics, and performs a SQL query containing the value of the submitted cookie.
